data.title: Ivan The Terrible
data.meta_description: Ivan the Terrible - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Ivan IV Vasilyevich, also known as Ivan the Terrible, was born in 1530 in Moscow to Vasili III and Elena Vasilyevna Glinskaya. When Ivan was only 3 years old, his father died, making him the Grand Prince of Russia. However, as a child, Ivan's mother Elena acted as regent and her uncle Mikhail Glinsky held true power. Elena later had Mikhail imprisoned and took a lover, consolidating her own power. When Ivan was 8 years old, his mother died, leaving him alone as the official but still young ruler of Russia.
